{"name": "Metropolitan Baptist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We only service family in the zip code 48203, 48206, 48238.

Food Pantry runs Jan.-Jun. Close in July & Aug. Reopens Sept.-Dec.

Pickup is on the Buena Vista side of the church. We have a clothing drive in April and October.

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Metropolitan-Baptist-Church/117846384909105
